title: Hextech Box Availability on a Champ in Champ Select
body: Information regarding whether or not you can earn a Hextech box on a ceratin champ can only be seen in COLLECTION --> CHAMPIONS (borders on champ icon). Would be be great if you can see this same info. in champ select so I don't have to make a mental list of champions I'd have to play if I wanted to snag a quick box. Makes it more convenient (:

replies.body: If I'm not mistaken this feature is already on the PBE.

Hmmmmm y'know this could actually be a pretty cool idea! I could see this being rather useful for a lot of people tbh, so I'd suggest posting it over in Client Discussion to get more players like yourself in on the conversation!
